eveHQMessage.title: EveHQ - Combat Log Analyser
eveHQMessage.message:
Work has started on a combat log analyser, which will exist as a standalone app and a plug-in for EveHQ.

At present, we can parse all combat logs from now back to 2004, both detailed and simple logs.

So, we're looking for ideas to present this information to users, and this blog should give ideas for inspiration.



- The EveHQ Development Team
